commit message: do not build versionName by method, to help F-droid's auto-update mode
also accept lower case x for reconciled
read account name first from opening balance, second from file name
inform user if no app for editing calendar event has been found
We want to prevent a deep category hierarchy being installed accidentally through bugs in clients of Category class
No need to recreate fragments if activity is restored from savedInstanceState
extend version info with flavor and installer
first prototype of auto-backup based on Financisto and WakefullIntentService
fixed minor issues and provided preference
time preference stores state upon orientation change, and persists value also when user was editing values with keyboard
try to schedule backups only when database or preferences have changed
wrap backup in transaction to prevent concurrent write access, during restore suspend alarms
updated res string for requires key
inform user when limit has been reached and link to purchase screen.
make sure plans are reinstated after package replace
translations for auto-backup functionality copied from Financisto
cherry-picked from release branch to include it into translations synced with Transifex
